text: by radiation therapy.    - Radiation therapy or chemotherapy and radiation therapy followed by surgery.    - Radiation therapy with or without chemotherapy for patients who cannot have surgery.        There is no standard treatment for stage IVB vulvar cancer. Treatment may include a clinical trial of a new treatment.   Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage IVB vulvar cancer. For more specific results, refine the search by using other
